snippet: The South Korean-born, Japan-based artist has installed a series of large-scale sculptures and land art pieces that create a dialogue with the palace’s legendary gardens.
abstract: The South Korean-born, Japan-based artist has installed a series of large-scale sculptures and land art pieces that create a dialogue with the palace’s legendary gardens.

headline.main: On View | Lee Ufan's Contemplative Sculptural Installations at Versailles
